item.title: Travel Global Think Local - Trailer
item.description:
Travel Global Think Local - Trailer

A documentary travel series which tells powerful stories of extraordinary people in incredible places. Travel Global Think Local documents compelling community projects through dramatic storytelling. The series is an innovative and engaging format of travel programming. It's about empowerment, sustainability for future generations, and the actions of people who are making our world a better place.

item.title: Sidney Tapia - Behind The Spray
item.description:
Sidney Tapia - Behind The Spray

Sidney Tapia is a well known Graffiti artist in Sydney, Australia. He was commissioned through Sydney water in April 2014 to create a mural for a pump house close to Sydney's train line.

item.title: Paradise Through Davids Lens // I Am The Rainforest
item.description:
Paradise Through Davids Lens // I Am The Rainforest

Campaign video for Tropical North Queensland's "Paradise Through Your Lens" David will take you on a journey through the secrets and mysteries within the World's oldest tropical rainforest - the incredible Daintree National Park. Observe the majesty of the rainforest from the hidden corners to the lush canopies that shelter the forest floor.

item.title: Journey To Japan
item.description:
Journey To Japan

The country that has stolen my heart.

item.title: Backpacking Oz - YHA
item.description:
Backpacking Oz - YHA

Had the pleasure of working with Youth Hosteling Australia (YHA) to produce a fun 1 minute commercial through the eyes of the common backpacker in Australia. Camera: Lumix Gh4 12-35mm f2.8 Panasonic Premiere CC After Effects CC Graded with Filmconvert
